    com.example.oopproject - package com.example.oopproject
    The main package of the Fitness Tracker API project.
    com.example.oopproject.cli - package com.example.oopproject.cli
    This package provides the command-line interface (CLI) for the OOP project, enabling user interaction through text-based commands and facilitating access to the application's functionalities.
    com.example.oopproject.config - package com.example.oopproject.config
    This package contains configuration classes for the Fitness Tracker application.
    com.example.oopproject.controllers - package com.example.oopproject.controllers
    This package contains the REST API controllers for the OOP project.
    com.example.oopproject.dto - package com.example.oopproject.dto
    This package contains Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes used for transferring authentication-related data between the client and the server.
    com.example.oopproject.exceptions - package com.example.oopproject.exceptions
    This package contains custom exception classes used throughout the OOP project.
    com.example.oopproject.models - package com.example.oopproject.models
    This package contains the domain model classes (entities) used in the OOP project.
    com.example.oopproject.repositories - package com.example.oopproject.repositories
    This package contains repository interfaces for the OOP project.
    com.example.oopproject.services - package com.example.oopproject.services
    This package contains service layer classes responsible for implementing the business logic of the OOP project.
    com.example.oopproject.util - package com.example.oopproject.util
    Utility classes for the OOP project.
